NewsArticle.Title: Updates
NewsArticle.Content: ***Updates*** *Count/Countess Map-Wide Bonus increased 10million - 50million Experience 100K - 150K Ability *Bats/Children kill exp/ab increase 2.5million - 3million Experience 10K - 15K Ability *Macabre Box Random chance of getting LA Raffle(x5) inside the Macabre Box DA Team
